data.price: Egaa Allaahn, mootiin dhugaa, ol ta’eera, Odoo wahyiin isaa gara kee bu’ee hin xumuramin dura, Qur’aana (dubbisuutti) hin jarjarin, “(Yaa) Rabbii kiyya! Beekumsa naaf dabali” jedhi.
data.arabic: فَتَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَلِكُ ٱلۡحَقُّۗ وَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ بِٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُقۡضَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَحۡيُهُۥۖ وَقُل رَّبِّ زِدۡنِي عِلۡمٗا

dua.name: Dua for Continuous Learning
dua.significanceReason: Requests ongoing divine guidance in the pursuit of knowledge, wisdom, and personal growth.
